Jogo sensacional. Jogo desde os 9 anos de idade e hoje com quase 28 anos, continuo jogando!!

great graphics, nice feel to the guns. 

disappointed when it comes re spawning in deathmatches though.
если хотите потерять добрую часть своей жизни, советую

This game is so special, it takes you as an hostage and somehow you like it. Truly a Stockholm Syndrom game.

It is sometimes impossible (at least for me) to play a matchmaking game without becoming extremly toxic, xenophobic and / or sexist. In order not to succumb to this behaviour I would recommend playing matchmaking either with 4 other friends or at least 3 friends and hoping that the joining random is not a bot.

The Dangerzone mode is quite fun, when not doing operation missions. Casual, Deathmatch and so on are quite fun if you don't want to commit self deletus after playing this game for 10 minutes.

And then there is the hacker problem, oh boy! You will have a hacker in matchmaking and casual, even if you are playing with prime, trust me I had enough screaming russian kids wallhacking and aimbotting. This will happen in at least 3-5 games you are playing (my experience).

I would give this game a solid 3 potatos out of 7 russian kids who never heared of discord. Truly a game for a masochist!
money = gone when i play game. very gud.

Классная игра, затягивает на долгое время. 
Плюсы:
-Высокая популярность, много друзей играют
-Не надоедает долгое время, мотивирует продолжать
-Интересные карты, механики, оружия, скины
-Интересные режимы
Минусы:
-Много токсичных игроков
-Читеры, смурфы, токсики, школьники могут попадаться в матчах
-Много доната (прайм-статус, скины, кейсы и тд)
-Требовательная игра, на слабом ПК максимум 60 ФПС
-Отсутсвует античит
